item.title: Making a whole server NOT PVP
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

find nonwild() in your client.java file and then add the max/min x and y coordinates of every place, then it will be all safe and no one can pk.

it should look something like this:

||absX >= @@@@ && absY >= $$$$ && absX <= ^^^^ && absY <= **** <— (NOT THE COMPLETE CODE)

@@@@ = Min X value
$$$$ = Min Y value
^^^^ = Max X value
**** = Max Y value

Read full topic
